documentation.text:
@dev Accredit an issuer (grant permission to issue credentials)
 @param issuerAddress Address of the issuer to accredit

@dev Reactivate a suspended issuer
 @param issuerAddress Address of the issuer to reactivate

@dev Get all accredited issuers
 @return Array of accredited issuer addresses

@dev Get total number of accredited issuers
 @return Count of accredited issuers

@dev Increment credential count for an issuer
 @param issuerAddress Address of the issuer

devdoc.details: Interface for the Issuer Registry contract Manages issuer accreditation and validation

accreditIssuer(address).details: Accredit an issuer (grant permission to issue credentials)

params.issuerAddress: Address of the issuer to accredit

getAccreditedIssuerCount().details: Get total number of accredited issuers

getIssuerCredentialCount(address).details: Get total credentials issued by an issuer

incrementIssuerCredentialCount(address).details: Increment credential count for an issuer

isAccredited(address).details: Check if an issuer is accredited

returns._0: True if accredited and active, false otherwise

isRegistered(address).details: Check if an issuer is registered (may not be accredited)

params.issuerAddress: Address of the issuer to reactivate
Address of the issuer to revoke
Address of the issuer to suspend
